body.name: ROG Thor 1200W Platinum II (1200 Watt, Fully Modular Power Supply, 80+ Platinum, Lambda A++ Certified, ROG heatsinks, 135mm PWM Fan, 0dB Mode, OLED Panel, Sleeved Cables, Aura Sync, 10 Year Warranty)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: Lambda Aplusplus Certification confirms the latest Thor wields menacing power in absolute stealth.
ROG heatsinks cover critical components, delivering lower temperatures and reduced noise.
A 135mm Axial-tech fan with PWM control delivers lower noise and keeps thermals in check.
Built with 100% Japanese capacitors and other premium components to achieve 80 Plus Platinum Certification.
OLED display monitors power draw in real time.
Aura Sync compatibility lets you customize and sync lighting effects with other compatible hardware.
body.description: The ROG Thor 1200W Platinum II is the be all, end all to power your high end gaming system. With an OLED screen for customization, 135mm PWM fan and ROG heatsinks for maximum cooling, this power supply is the next step in your ultimate gaming journey.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.7 4.7 out of 5 stars 551 ratings 4.7 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unmatched Power and Style for Enthusiast PC Builds!
reviews.reviewText: Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐The ROG Thor 1200W Platinum II, a fully modular power supply, sets the gold standard for power supplies in the world of PC gaming and enthusiast builds.Pros: 1. Massive Power Output: The 1200W power output is more than enough for even the most demanding PC setups. It ensures your components receive a stable and efficient power supply. 2. Fully Modular Design: The fully modular design allows you to connect only the cables you need, reducing clutter and improving cable management. This is crucial for building a clean and organized system. 3. 80+ Platinum Efficiency: The 80+ Platinum certification ensures energy efficiency, reducing power consumption and heat generation. It’s an environmentally friendly and cost-effective choice in the long run. 4. ROG Heatsinks: The integrated ROG heatsinks not only look fantastic but also help dissipate heat efficiently, ensuring the power supply runs cool under heavy loads. 5. OLED Panel: The OLED panel provides real-time information about power consumption, fan speed, and other vital stats, adding both functionality and a high-tech look to your PC. 6. Sleeved Cables: The included sleeved cables not only contribute to a clean and stylish look but also ensure durability and ease of cable management. 7. Aura Sync Compatibility: If you have other Aura Sync-compatible components, the Thor power supply syncs with them, allowing you to create a cohesive and synchronized lighting scheme for your build. 8. Zero Noise in 0dB Mode: The 135mm PWM fan is whisper-quiet, and the 0dB mode ensures that the fan remains off under low loads, further reducing noise levels. 9. Impressive 10-Year Warranty: The 10-year warranty offers peace of mind, showcasing ASUS’s confidence in the power supply’s longevity and performance.Cons: 1. Price: The ROG Thor power supply, with all its advanced features and premium build quality, comes at a higher price point compared to standard power supplies. However, for those seeking uncompromising quality and performance, it’s a worthwhile investment.In summary, the ROG Thor 1200W Platinum II is the epitome of a high-end power supply unit. It combines extreme power output, exceptional efficiency, style, and advanced features into one sleek package. If you’re building a top-tier gaming PC or enthusiast system, this power supply is an excellent choice. It not only delivers the power your system needs but also enhances the aesthetics and functionality of your build. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The cables that come with the psu are great. Braided thin and very flexible. The 12vhpwr native cable worked like a charm as well. I wish they would include a 90 degree cable rather than the pcie 12v and the native 12v, but that's ok since I had to order custom cables anyways. If you are using a case in the 20l or above range you should be fine. I'm using a 15l case and had to order custom cables because these are too long to manage with what I have crammed in there.My biggest worry was noise and coil whine. I watched some reviews that suggested there was bad coil whine on these. I threw a sustained 800w load at this (1000w PSU variant) and heard 0 whine. Fan was quiet as well and follows a pretty good fan less design until a high internal temp is picked up. Regular gaming on a 4080 and 7950x the fan started once and it was at a very low rpm.The RGB is whatever. If you don't like it, just don't plug in the RGB cable to the PSU and it won't turn on.Psu itself looks great. If it's viewable from the outside, it should add rather than detract from the aesthetic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality PSU
reviews.reviewText: I have had good experience with several Corsair and Seasonic PSU's over the years. This ASUS PSU caught my attention because of its OLED display and beautiful style. Knowing this is a custom PSU made by Seasonic, I was confident this would be a high quality product.The PSU comes with a 16-pin 12vhpwr cable and works perfectly with ASUS ROG Strix RTX 4090. So far I have seen maximum overall power draw at 650W and the PSU is silent. I leave the hybrid fan on since RTX 4090 can draw quite a bit of power. This PSU is expensive but I think it's worth it in my experience. I wish I had bought it sooner at a lower price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Personal Experience with the ROG Thor 1200W Platinum II Power Supply
reviews.reviewText: I’m writing this review after spending quality time with my ROG Thor 1200W Platinum II power supply, and I must say, I’m genuinely impressed. Right off the bat, one aspect that stands out is its incredibly smooth and linear power delivery.Being an avid gamer, I’ve got it hooked up to my graphics card that often operates at full throttle. What struck me was the unwavering consistency in the power supply, even under such demanding circumstances. It never misses a beat, ensuring my gaming sessions are uninterrupted and my equipment runs flawlessly.Aside from its reliable performance, this power supply comes with a few bells and whistles that I find very appealing. The OLED display, for one, is a neat feature. It adds a futuristic touch, providing useful information right at my fingertips.Moreover, the ROG Thor 1200W Platinum II is as stylish as it is functional. The sleeved cables and the Aura Sync compatibility give me the freedom to customize my setup’s aesthetics. And let’s not forget the 0dB mode - it’s so silent, you wouldn’t know it’s working hard to power up your rig.It’s also worth noting that the 10-year warranty brings an extra layer of reassurance, underscoring the quality and longevity of this power supply.All in all, the ROG Thor 1200W Platinum II power supply has not only met but exceeded my expectations. It’s a reliable powerhouse, delivering consistent performance while adding a touch of style to my rig. This is one investment I’m truly pleased with!

Compre este PSU para remplazar una Cooler Master de 1000w que ya tenia conmigo poco mas de 11 años. Pese a que hay opciones mas baratas para una fuente de 850w decidí comprar esta por su aspecto visual.Llevo poco mas de un mes de uso y es excelente. Es muy silenciosa y estéticamente se ve genial. Venia con los cables y aditamentos descritos en su caja e incluso con un cable de 12 pines para las nuevas tarjetas de Nvidia (fue vendido por amazon de México).Muy satisfecho con la compra llego en perfectas condiciones y antes del tiempo mencionado.

reviews.reviewTitle: ASUS ROG Thor 850W Platinum II Fully Modular Power Supply
reviews.reviewText: This has to be one of the best and most beautiful psu you will buy. Your not buying it just to throw into your pc it will treat you well for years to come for the longevity. Highly recommend
La tengo con una 4080 y componentes tope de gama para el dia de hoy, y no me ha dado ningun problema, aparte no siento que haga ruido.

I recently upgraded my system with the ASUS ROG Loki SFX-L 850W Platinum White Edition power supply, replacing my Corsair RM850, and the difference is remarkable. The first thing that stood out was its size - it's about two-thirds smaller than a standard PSU, making it a perfect fit for compact builds without compromising on power.This power supply comes with an adapter plate, which was a handy addition, and the cables are impressively flexible. This flexibility made cable management a breeze, allowing for a clean, well-organized setup. The design complements my all-white Y60 build perfectly, adding to the aesthetic while delivering robust performance.The 80+ Platinum efficiency is a testament to its quality, ensuring optimal power usage and reduced heat generation. The 120mm fan keeps it running cool and quiet, a significant plus for any build. Additionally, the PCIe-5 connector worked seamlessly with my GeForce RTX 4080, providing stable and reliable power for high-end gaming.In summary, the ASUS ROG Loki SFX-L 850W Platinum White Edition is an exceptional power supply unit. Its compact size, high flexibility, and superb performance make it an excellent choice for anyone looking to build a sleek, powerful, and well-managed system. It's a phenomenal piece of hardware that I would highly recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Asus is the best, it's prestige
reviews.reviewText: Very high quality, beautiful technology and smart.
